column5: Anyone on here gonna be up to Halley's the first week in Sept.? This will be my second trip to Canada, a friends first, and the other three multiple times. Anyone who has been to caribou falls landing who has any tips or info would be great. What's the fishing like up their this time of year, I went in June of 07 and it wasn't bad. Thanks for any help.https://www.walleyecentral.com/forums...c/progress.gif
